fists.name: High Forger Gloves
fists.lore: Blacksmith gloves treated to withstand extreme temperatures, granting the wielder fire damage on strike.

fists.name: Kringle Knuckles
fists.lore: Brass knuckles wrapped in tough leather, used to deliver surprisingly solid holiday cheer.

fists.name: Grater Gauntlets
fists.lore: Gauntlets crafted from salvaged cheese graters. Their rough surface shreds armor and flesh.

fists.name: Donut Glazes
fists.lore: Gloves covered in crystallized sugar glaze, making the fists heavy and sticky upon impact.

fists.name: Bear Claws
fists.lore: Gloves reinforced with the actual claws of a massive ice bear, guaranteeing severe bleed damage.

fists.name: Bone Claws
fists.lore: Simple, lightweight claws carved from ice creature bone for swift, consecutive attacks.

fists.name: Wolf Fang Claws
fists.lore: A reward given to hunters who successfully collect 50 high-quality wolf pelts. Deep, jagged bleed wounds.

fists.name: Jester Gloves
fists.lore: Gloves worn by the Toykin tricksters. Lined with a subtle coating of irritating poison.

fists.name: RC Gauntlets
fists.lore: Gauntlets built from old remote control parts. They store and release high bursts of electricity.
